```{r}
library(readr)
thyroid <- read_csv('thyroid.csv', 'show_col_types' = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(VIM)
aggr(thyroid, prop=FALSE, numbers=TRUE)
```
```{r}
x <- as.data.frame(abs(is.na(thyroid)))

library(stats)
y <- x[which(apply(x, MARGIN=2, sd)>0)] # >0 有缺失值
as.data.frame.array(cor(y))
```
